appDesc.message: Cruthaich freagairtean gun chrìoch bho ChatGPT uile - eòlach (ann an cànan sam bith!)

prompt_updateReplyInt.message: Ùraich an t - eadar - ama freagairt (5 diogan air a 'char as lugha)

alert_willReplyIn.message: Bidh ChatGPT Infinity a 'freagairt a - steach

alert_willReplyEvery.message: Bidh ChatGPT Infinity a 'freagairt a h - uile duine
